original_title: SDB bank relaunches Lakdaru Savings account, providing unmatched benefits
original_body_lines: SDB bank, a leading licensed specialised bank in Sri Lanka, is thrilled to announce the relaunch of its highly popular Lakdaru savings account with an array of new and enhanced features, aimed at effectively cultivating the healthy habit of saving in Sri Lankan children. SDB bank had received remarkable success with Lakdaru Savings Account since its initial launch in 2012 and building on this success, the bank has taken steps to enhance Lakdaru even further, aiming to establish it as one of the best children’s savings accounts in the market.

“A Smart Choice for Your Child’s Future,” SDB Lakdaru now offers the highest interest rates in the market, making it an ideal option for parents seeking effective savings solutions. Moreover, SDB Lakdaru introduces tiered gifts and rewards, insurance schemes, and an exclusive scholarship award for top performers at the Grade 5 Scholarship Exam.
